title: Fine Art Campus
description: An academic campus designed around the concept of 'Bricks and Greens'. The project integrates courtyards as central interactive and climatic elements, while using distinct colored bricks for each department to establish identity. The campus balances education, accommodation, sports, and staff housing through a cohesive zoning approach.
features: Concept of 'Bricks and Greens' with structures built around courtyards
Six departments each defined by unique colored brick facades
Courtyards for natural light, ventilation, and social interaction
Jaali walls for ornamental screening and airflow
Hip roof design for effective rain and heat management
Zoning includes education block, student accommodation, staff housing, and sports facilities
Integration of green spaces throughout campus layout
Clustered building arrangement to foster community interaction
